definition: evaluation committee/judging panel/judging panel member/adjudicator/abbr. for 評選委員會委員|评选委员会委员[ping2 xuan3 wei3 yuan2 hui4 wei3 yuan2]
to discuss/to comment/to criticize/to judge/to choose (by public appraisal)
same as 逶 in 逶迤 winding, curved
to entrust/to cast aside/to shift (blame etc)/to accumulate/roundabout/winding/dejected/listless/committee member/council/end/actually/certainly

sentences.english: The panel of judges looked through more than 43, 000 entries to this year's competition.
sentences.chinese: 今年評委小組審閱了43000多幅參賽作品。

sentences.english: Her charm prejudiced the judges in her favour.
sentences.chinese: 她姿色迷人，因而評委都偏向她。

sentences.english: The story became even more dramatic when Bao returned to the jury.
sentences.chinese: 這個故事變得更加戲劇化，當包小柏返回評委會時。

sentences.english: Don is material added ageratum, the judges felt very curious.
sentences.chinese: 唐正在材料中加入了藿香，評委感到很好奇。

sentences.english: So much has been made of the chemistry among the judges this season on American Idol.
sentences.chinese: 這一季的美國偶像經歷了一次評委大換血。

sentences.english: 1990-present Judge in Fujian Province for National Fine Art Exhibition.
sentences.chinese: 1990年至今擔任全國美展福建省評委。

sentences.english: Jurors are respected, working artists in the film industry.
sentences.chinese: 評委會成員是電影業中受尊敬的在職藝術家。

sentences.english: Always remember your key object is judges.
sentences.chinese: 要始終記住你的重點對象是評委。

sentences.english: The baby with the loudest howls is declared the winner by the sumo judge.
sentences.chinese: 哭聲最響亮的嬰兒被評委宣佈爲比賽冠軍。

sentences.english: He was asked to judge at the art exhibition.
sentences.chinese: 他被邀請當畫展的評委。

sentences.english: As with Matter & Manner (Part VIII & IX) personal bias must not be allowed to influence an adjudicator's assessment of Method.
sentences.chinese: 評判辯論方法時，評委不得受個人偏見的影響。

sentences.english: Since 2006 also have acted as the jury of Chinese Film Media Award.
sentences.chinese: 2006年起任華語電影傳媒大獎評委。

sentences.english: Zhang Pingxi the judges do a very serious professional.
sentences.chinese: 張馮喜這個評委做得是很認真專業的。

sentences.english: Berlin film festival's judges appreciate highly the film performed by Amber.
sentences.chinese: 柏林電影展的評委們對郭采潔主演的電影評價很高。

sentences.english: In the judges’ eyes, however, the film was just not artsy enough.
sentences.chinese: 但在評委眼中，該片在藝術上還欠些火候。

sentences.english: "China's Got Talent" will retain the three-person jury panel of the original British version and will not change its members during the run.
sentences.chinese: 中國達人的評委也是三個，和英國達人的設置一樣。

definition: to select on the basis of a vote or consensus
to compete/to take part in a competition
